sourcesContent:
<template>

    <el-form>
        <el-form-item>
            <el-input v-model="regUser.phone" placeholder="输入用户名"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item>
            <el-input v-model="regUser.password" type="password" placeholder="输入密码"></el-input>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item>
            <el-button class="regBtn" @click="reg">注册</el-button>
        </el-form-item>
    </el-form>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: "UserReg",
        data() {
            return {
                regUser: {
                    phone: '',
                    password: ''
                }
            }
        },
        methods: {
            reg() {
                this.$axios.post("/user/register", this.regUser)
                    .then(resp => {
                        if (resp.data.code === 200) {
                            this.$message.success("注册成功！")
                        } else {
                            this.$message.error(resp.data.data)
                        }
                    })
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
